```{r person-level data}
#set filepath for data file
filepath <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LRI-2/Data/main/ILD/AMIBshare_persons_2019_0501.csv"

AMIB_persons <- read.csv(file=url(filepath),header=TRUE)
```
